A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am truly amazed at how many faults this movie had and still made me absolutely love it. I loved it even more the second time. I'm one of the 1977 fanboys for life. A lot of us seem to feel this movie is a slap in our face. I have not been so moved and excited in years. Sure\, some points we were waiting on didn't pan out the way we hoped or expected. So what.  Loved it!
